titleStmt.title: The Description of Giles Mompesson, late knight censured by Parliament the 17th of March, A⁰ 1620

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from STC (2nd ed.).
Contains three panels of engraved illustrations, accompanied by verses at top of each panel, and general caption verse across the bottom of the whole sheet.
Reproduction of originals in: Society of Antiquaries and Folger Shakespeare Library.
